title: La kulan kooxda
subtitle: Kooxda Seemorg Foundation waxa la ka kooban yihiin injineero, cilmi-baarayaal, iyo naqshadeeyayaal xiiseeya dhisidda cilmi baaris Islaami ah oo casri ah. Hadafkayagu waa inaan buuxinno farqiga u dhexeeya aqoonta caadiga ah iyo tignoolajiyada casriga ah, annagoo hubinayna in dhaxalka qani ee suugaanta Islaamku si fudud ugu diyaar noqdo dunida oo dhan.
board-subtitle: Guddiga Seemorg Foundation waxa uu ka kooban yahay khubaro cilmi-baaris iyo tignoolaji oo la isku halayn karo, midkastoo leh khibrad tobanaan sano ah oo ka soo jeeda meelaha ay khuseeyaan. Si wadajir ah ayay u maamulaan ururka iyagoo hubinaya inuu horumarka ku sii socdo himilooyinkiisa horumarinta aqoonta Islaamka.

abdellatif-abdelfattah.name: Abdellatif Abdelfattah
abdellatif-abdelfattah.description: Abdellatif wuxuu aasaasay Tarteel AI, wuxuu hogaaminayey injineernimada Quran.com, wuxuuna ka shaqeeyay Twitter.

mohamed-lamine.name: Mohamed Lamine
mohamed-lamine.description: Mohamed wuxuu ahaa hormuudka naqshadeynta ee Thmanyah, waxa uu talo siinayaa bilowga ganacsiyada si ay u sameeyaan alaabo cusub laga bilaabo 0 ilaa 1.

ahmed-riad.name: Ahmed Riad
ahmed-riad.description: Ahmed wuxuu aasaasay Remail AI, Betterbook, wuxuuna ahaa injineer ka shaqeeya Quran.com.

ryad-ramo.name: Ryad Ramo
ryad-ramo.description: Ryad waa cilmi-baadhe ku takhasusay cilmi iyo taariikh Islaamka. Wuxuu leeyahay shahaadada BA ee Daraasaadka Islaamka wuxuuna aasaasay GEMS of Al-Andalus.

rahma-fateen.name: Rahma Fateen
rahma-fateen.description: Rahma waxay hoggaamisaa tarjumada Carabiga ee Tarteel AI. Waxay ahayd turjubaan Hayâ€™adda Xuquuqda Aadanaha.

ahmed-khan.name: Ahmed Khan
ahmed-khan.description: Ahmed waa arday jooga Zaytuna College. Wuxuu abuuray barnaamijka The Creative Minority.

ahmed-aktan.name: Ahmet Aktan
ahmed-aktan.description: Ahmed wuxuu haystaa PhD. Jaamacadda Al-Azhar. Wuxuu hogaamiyaa koox digitization iyo dadaallada la xiriira.

adnan-zulfiqar.name: Adnan Zulfiqar
adnan-zulfiqar.description: Adnan wuxuu ku takhasusay sharciga Islaamka iyo kan dembiyada. Wuxuu qoray xeerarka dembiyada ee Maldives iyo Soomaaliya.

intisar-rabb.name: Intisar Rabb
intisar-rabb.description: Intisar waa bare sharci oo jaamacadda Harvard ah. Waxay hoggaamisaa SHARIAsource iyo Barnaamijka Qaanuunka Islaamka.

zeki-mokhtarzada.name: Zeki Mokhtarzada
zeki-mokhtarzada.description: Zeki waa ganacsade leh khibrad farsamo oo qoto dheer. Wuxuu wada aasaasay Freewebs iyo Truebill.
